2024.overview: A year of personal growth and career advancement.
potential_achievements: Securing a promotion or starting a successful side business
Improving communication skills, leading to better relationships
Making a significant financial investment that pays off
possible_challenges: Balancing work and personal life
Dealing with unexpected health issues
Overcoming self-doubt in professional settings
2024.yearly_advice: Focus on setting boundaries between work and personal life to maintain balance. Trust in your abilities, and take calculated risks when opportunities arise.

2025.overview: Focus on relationships and personal development.
potential_achievements: Strengthening bonds with family and friends
Learning a new skill that enhances career prospects
Successfully resolving a long-standing conflict
possible_challenges: Adapting to changes in the workplace
Managing stress and anxiety
Resisting the temptation to make impulsive decisions
2025.yearly_advice: Take time to nurture relationships, and practice mindfulness to manage stress. Embrace changes in your environment with an open mind.
